In England, in the seven days to 30 July, there were 162,187 new confirmed cases (288.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 July, there were 226,331 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 28% (64,144 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 August is 5,199,102 (9,236.8 cases per 100,000 population).
